note: Ancient Rome completes his trilogy on ancient civilizations.
title: Dunstan serves as a visiting scholar at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and has taught at Carnegie Mellon University, North Carolina State University, and the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. His research interests focus on social and cultural history
